pcanvas.camera
Class Camera

java.lang.Object
  pcanvas.camera.Camera

public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object

Camera object for use on PApplet and OpenGLApplet processing windows.

Field Summary
private  processing.core.PApplet applet
          The PApplet used to make PApplet.camera() calls.
protected static float DEFAULT_TDISTANCE
          Default distance to target object if distance is not specified.
private  float distanceToTarget
          Distance from camera to target.
private  java.lang.Boolean isTracking
          Whether or not this camera should 'track' the target (stay stationary instead of follow).
private  CanvasPen3D pen
          A CanvasPen3D for debugging purposes.
private  Point position
          Camera Position, Target location and Target's previous location, respectively.
private  Point target
          Camera Position, Target location and Target's previous location, respectively.
private  Point targetPrev
          Camera Position, Target location and Target's previous location, respectively.
private  Vector upVector
          The vector which represents which direction is 'up' in 3-space.
private  float zoomScale
          Scale factor when calculating zooms towards and away from the target.

Constructor Detail

Camera

public Camera(processing.core.PApplet applet)
Most basic constructor necessary for creating a camera. Accepts a PApplet object in order to make base API PApplet.camera(float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float) calls.

Parameters:
applet - the applet this camera is attached to.

Camera

public Camera(processing.core.PApplet applet,
              Vector upVector)
More advanced constructor which accepts a base PApplet and a custom upVector. The upVector can also be set from the setUpVector(Vector) method.

Parameters:
applet - the applet this camera is attached to.
upVector - the upVector this camera uses for calculating rotations and positional information.

Camera

public Camera(processing.core.PApplet applet,
              Point target,
              float distance)

Camera

public Camera(processing.core.PApplet applet,
              Vector upVector,
              Point target,
              float distance)
Method Detail

setZoomScale

public void setZoomScale(float zoomScale)
Sets the zoom scale for this camera. This dictates how much the camera should scale the wheel rotation values when zooming towards or away from the target.

The default zooms scale is 1.0F.

Parameters:
zoomScale - the new zoom scale.

setIsTracking

public void setIsTracking(java.lang.Boolean isTracking)
Sets the isTracking boolean to the provided boolean.

Parameters:
isTracking - whether or not to track or follow the target.

updateDistance

public void updateDistance(float distance)
Updates the distance between this camera and its target.

Parameters:
distance - new distance to target.

getDistanceToTarget

public float getDistanceToTarget()
Retrieves the distance from this camera to its target.

Returns:
distanceToTarget - the distance to our target Point.

updateTarget

public void updateTarget(Point target)
Updates the camera's target. This should be called every frame in the PApplet.draw() method in order to observe proper camera behavior.

Parameters:
target - the new target.

setUpVector

public void setUpVector(Vector upVector)
Changes the upVector this camera uses to calculate rotations, zooms and overall perspective correctness.

Parameters:
upVector - a new Vector representing which direction is up.

update

public void update()
The main update method for the call. Along with updateTarget(Point), this method should also be called every PApplet.draw() frame. It is effectively a wrapper call for PApplet.camera(float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float) using our stored, rotated, etc. position, target and upVector.

updatePitch

public void updatePitch(float pitch)
Updates the pitch rotation of the camera about the target.

Parameters:
pitch - a new pitch angle, in radians.

updateYaw

public void updateYaw(float yaw)
Updates the yaw rotation of the camera about the target.

Parameters:
yaw - a new yaw angle, in radians.

reset

public void reset()
Resets the camera to its original position.
Take a look at processing documentation for details on exact locations.

setDefaults

private void setDefaults(java.lang.Boolean useAppDefaults)
Private, internal method used to set the initial default values for the camera. Accepts a Boolean describing whether or not to use default Processing locations see: reset() for more information on initial positions.

Parameters:
useAppDefaults - whether or not to use processing defaults for the camera and target positions.

setupWheelListener

private void setupWheelListener()
Private method used to inject a MouseWheelListener to the main PApplet in order to ensure proper zoom functionality.

setupRotationListeners

private void setupRotationListeners()
Private method used to inject a MouseMotionListener to the main PApplet in order to ensure proper rotation updates.
